glosses: to block, cover, conceal, hide, obscure; to veil
to close down, shut down; to suppress, abolish

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish قپامق, قاپامق (kapamak, “to shut, close”), from Old Anatolian Turkish [script needed] (kapa-, “to close”), from Proto-Turkic *kapa-.
Cognate with Old Uyghur [script needed] (kap-, “to close”), Azerbaijani qapamaq (“to shut, close”), Chuvash хупма (hupma, “to close, shut”).
